content.description: QuestionÂ refers to the 1883 image below.
content.question: Which of the following arguments did some late-nineteenth-century leaders use to justify the situation depicted in the image?

choices.label: The federal government provided social welfare services for people living in poverty.
Immigrant workers contributed to economic growth in the United States.
Evolutionary principles determined that people succeeded based on their merits.
The reliance on male laborers protected women from the dangers of factory work.

content.answer: Evolutionary principles determined that people succeeded based on their merits.

topic.text: 6.9: Responses to Immigration in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
